org.stekikun.dolmen.syntax

Class Lexer.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.stekikun.dolmen.syntax.Lexer.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Lexer

    public static final class Lexer.Builder
extends Object
    A builder class for Lexer, where entries can be added incrementally, and which takes care of collecting problem reports along the way
    Author:
    St√©phane Lescuyer
    See Also:
    addEntry(Lexer.Entry)
